title: Red Pepper and Chile Tahini Sauce
ingredients: 2large red bell peppers, roasted, cored, seeded, and peeled (see page 155)
1medium Fresno or other medium-hot fresh red chile, roasted, cored, seeded, and peeled (see page 155)
¼cup (60 ml) fresh lemon juice, plus more as needed
1medium garlic clove, finely grated or minced
1½teaspoons kosher salt, plus more as needed
directions: Put the bell peppers and the chile in a food processor or a blender, add the tahini, lemon juice, and garlic, and puree until completely smooth. Add the honey, paprika, and salt and pulse again to blend. With the motor running, slowly stream in the ice water and process until smooth. Taste and adjust the seasoning. Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 3 days.
